Note: For the usual version see 6771 and 6772.
_description: Gospel, ‘In gallicantu natalis domini’, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle (‘Exit edictum’ and ‘Et pastores erant’)

BLHar4196.First Lines: In þe emperure dais octouianeWhen fiue thowsand ȝeres war gane…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …Þat es endles ioy and pese to dureIn cumyng of oure sauioure
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Exiit edictum a cesare augusto.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: Descripcio mundi uniuersalis in gallicantu Euangelium secundum Lucam (rubric, f. 12va)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): I.212-220.
